name: Ace of Swords
description: A hand issues from a cloud, grasping a sword encircled by a crown.

name: Two of Swords
description: A hoodwinked female figure balances two swords across her shoulders.

name: Three of Swords
description: Three swords pierce a heart, with clouds and rain in the background.

name: Four of Swords
description: The effigy of a knight lies in prayer upon his tomb.

name: Five of Swords
description: A disdainful man surveys two retreating figures. He holds three swords, having conquered the field.

name: Six of Swords
description: A ferryman carries passengers across a calm river toward a distant shore.

name: Seven of Swords
description: A man carries five swords while two remain in the ground; a camp lies nearby.

name: Eight of Swords
description: A bound and blindfolded woman is surrounded by swords, representing temporary restraint.

name: Nine of Swords
description: A woman sits in lamentation with nine swords hanging above, embodying deep sorrow.

name: Ten of Swords
description: A figure lies prostrate, pierced by ten swords.

name: Page of Swords
description: A lithe figure holds a sword upright while moving quickly, alert to surroundings.

name: Knight of Swords
description: A knight rides swiftly, sword raised, ready to scatter his enemies.

name: Queen of Swords
description: The Queen holds her sword upright, extending her other hand; her countenance reflects experience with sorrow.

name: King of Swords
description: The King sits in judgment, holding his unsheathed sword, symbolizing measured authority and decisive intellect.

name: Ace of Swords Reversed
description: A hand issues from a cloud, grasping a sword encircled by a crown.

name: Two of Swords Reversed
description: A hoodwinked female figure balances two swords across her shoulders.

name: Three of Swords Reversed
description: Three swords pierce a heart, with clouds and rain in the background.

name: Four of Swords Reversed
description: The effigy of a knight lies in prayer upon his tomb.

name: Five of Swords Reversed
description: A disdainful man surveys retreating figures; the reversed card suggests resolution and release.

name: Six of Swords Reversed
description: A ferryman carries passengers across a calm river toward a distant shore.

name: Seven of Swords Reversed
description: A man carrying swords; reversal indicates discovery or correction of deceit.

name: Eight of Swords Reversed
description: A bound and blindfolded woman is surrounded by swords, symbolizing release or escape when reversed.

name: Nine of Swords Reversed
description: A woman sits in lamentation with nine swords above; reversed suggests easing of sorrow.

name: Ten of Swords Reversed
description: A figure lies prostrate, pierced by ten swords; reversed indicates mitigation or recovery.

name: Page of Swords Reversed
description: A lithe figure holds a sword upright while moving quickly; reversal suggests lack of preparation or negative surprises.

name: Knight of Swords Reversed
description: A knight rides swiftly with sword raised; reversed warns of reckless or destructive action.

name: Queen of Swords Reversed
description: The Queen‚Äôs sword is raised; reversed indicates harshness, malice, or deceit.

name: King of Swords Reversed
description: The King holds his sword; reversed indicates misuse of power, cruelty, or unethical judgment.
